text: The Night of Counting the Years, also released in Arabic as The Mummy, (Arabic: Al-Mummia المومياء) is a 1969 Egyptian drama movie directed by Shadi Abdel Salam and starring Nadia Lutfi, Ahmad Hegazi, Ahmed Marei, Shafik Nour El Din. ==Other websites== * * Category:1969 drama movies Category:Egyptian movies
title: The Night of Counting the Years
